description: Monitor system performance during Gemini CLI operations. Tracks CPU, memory usage, and execution time for performance optimization.

hooks.command: echo "$(date +%s.%N),$(ps -o %cpu= -p $$),$(ps -o rss= -p $$),$CLAUDE_TOOL_NAME,end" >> ~/.gemini/performance.csv; if [[ $(wc -l < ~/.gemini/performance.csv) -gt 1000 ]]; then tail -n 500 ~/.gemini/performance.csv > ~/.gemini/performance.csv.tmp && mv ~/.gemini/performance.csv.tmp ~/.gemini/performance.csv; fi
